Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Granisetron is approved to be used alone or with other drugs to prevent:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Nausea and vomiting caused by chemotherapy. It is used in adults.

Section.Para: Granisetron is also available in a different form called granisetron hydrochloride. For more information, see the Drug Information Summary for Granisetron Hydrochloride.
